P

ProductCategory - Class in com.codecool.shop.model

ProductCategoryDaoJDBC - Class in com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation

ProductCategoryDaoMem - Class in com.codecool.shop.dao.implementation
This is a simple product category data access object which helps the ProductCategory class to save and load data from the memory.
